sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-dialog v-model="dialog" max-width="500px">
    <v-card>
      <v-card-title class="headline">Xác nhận đặt vé</v-card-title>
      <v-card-text>Bạn có chắc chắn muốn đặt vé cho {{ cinemaName }} vào lúc {{ showtime }}?</v-card-text>
      <v-card-actions>
        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
        <v-btn color="blue darken-1" text @click="confirmBooking">Xác nhận</v-btn>
        <v-btn color="blue darken-1" text @click="dialog = false">Hủy</v-btn>
      </v-card-actions>
    </v-card>
  </v-dialog>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: {
    dialog: Boolean,
    cinemaName: String,
    showtime: String
  },
  methods: {
    confirmBooking() {
      this.$emit('confirm');
      this.dialog = false;
    }
  }
}
</script>
